Creation

20 Feb 2015
Being the first post here I feel compelled to at least introduce myself to anyone who decides to read my blog.

My name is Zac Blanco. I'm currently an undergraduate studying Electrical and Computer Engineering at Rutgers University. I hope to also double major with computer science, and eventually continue on to graduate school. My expected graduation date is May of 2018

I wanted to start a blog to share my thoughts and ideas about any of my work, projects, and other interests. Most topics here will converge on ideas in computer science theory, programming, and technology.

Enjoy!
